page.title: 02Home life
page.content: Most people live in semi-detached houses ,but some people live in detached or bungalows. The approximate number of windows in a semi-detached is 9 to 10 and in a bungalow there are approxamately 12 to 14 windows. There are usually 2 external doors on each house the front and the back. Most houses have a garage. We did a survey of children that share a bedroom with brothers or sisters, the results were 7 do share a room and 17 do not share a room, so most children in 1985 are lucky enough to have their own room. At the moment there is a modernisation programme in progress on the houses. Most 11 year olds go to bed at approximately 9o'clock to 11o'clock. In the morning most children get up between 7 and 8o'clock, eat breakfast which consists of cereals and toast. They then walk to school.
